The most fun real-life survival game.Thanks to the support of the survivors.This update:

1. Fixed Angel's new clothes task bug
2.Fixed bug that the cabinet can't be opened in the resident
3.Added iCloud sync support, whether it's on the iPhone or iPad, without losing progress.
4.Optimized people dialogue
5.The difficulty mode can be turned on after finish the simple or normal mode
6.Added Russian and Spanish version

The most fun real-life survival game.Thanks to the support of the survivors.This update:
1.Optimized hotel task tips in prologue；
2.Optimized the script of the suction fan, players turn on the switch of the police station before extracting the poison fog；
3.Optimized that the zombies in the room after the poison fog is extracted will not be revived after being destroyed；
4.Optimized that gas mask will not be worn on the model head at non-poison fog areas；
5.Optimized the character can move at and replace weapon at the same time. 
6.Optimized long-range weapons: you can change bullets while running.
7.Optimized When the health, vigour, fullness and mood value attributes fall to zero, the character does not die immediately, but gradually reduces stamina.
8.Added a heading arrow to the minimap to mark the direction of the enemy and our side in the minimap；
9.The shelf life of canned food is extended: the original setting, canned fish for 6 days, canned meat for 8 days. Changed to canned fish for 10 days and canned meat for 11 days.
10.Add the indicator of the amount of resources remaining in the current map that have not been taken.
11.Lockpick optimization: The basic Lockpick can be used to open cabinets twice and can be manufactured two at a time. The advanced Lockpick can be used to open cabinets no more than four times. Manufacturing costs are adjusted accordingly.
12.Increase the cost of the reading desk, but the desk no longer needs to be repaired.
13.Durability optimization of melee-type weapons: the first-class weapons maintain the same durability, the intermediate weapons have slightly higher durability, and the durability of advanced weapons is greatly improved.
14.The durability of the generator is improved: the durability of the generator was originally 240 minutes, changed to 360 minutes, the battery was changed from the basic 120 minutes, the advanced 240 minutes to 200 minutes and 400 minutes. Increase repairing costs.
15.Moving in the shelter changed to running.
16.The buttons of the start difficulty selection are changed to normal, hard, nightmare, and the corresponding text description is modified. Actual difficulties have not changed;
17.Remove empty boxes in Normal and Hard mode, keep empty boxes in Nightmare mode.
18.Some English, Russian, Spanish and Portuguese optimization and revision；
If you have any problem in the game, please feel free to email us: cs@digipotato.cn

In this version, we add new FREE DLC - Big Brother’s Survival Legend for all survival game fans who have purchased the base game of Delivery From The Pain. Big Brother is watching you!

About New DLC:
1.New Story: the story between Big Brother and Moira and explain lots of confuses you may have while playing base game.
2.New Pet: a dog named hamburger will join your fight with zombies, and he can be more energetic in toxic areas.
3.New game system: creative feeding system, training system and cooking system will offer you a brand-new survival adventure experience in the zombie’s world.
4.New Map: a new map of lumberyard will be added to offer you base survival food sources, you can hunt animals and get other materials like potatoes, medical herbs and wheat there.
5.New Character: a man who worked for Big Brother in Big Brother previous gang will appear in new DLC, you will know how can he survive in doomsday and you can trade with him too.
6.New Mode: you can get unlimited survival supply pack under assist mode when you want to have a quick understanding about the new story, if you are an experienced survival game player, you can try the survival mode with significant difficulty to challenge yourself.
7.New Cooking System: you can send gifts to Moira to get new surprise from her.
8.Language Support: this version supports English, Simplified and Traditional Chinese and we always hope to add more new languages, if you are willing to help us or have any feedback, please contact us via cs@digipotato.cn

We would like to thank Chief in DLC English Language Editing / Proofreading --- Timothy A. Marsters for helping us. Thank you!
Thank you all for supporting pay to play survival indie game and giving hope to a tiny game studio with only 7 members!

Thanks to the support of all survivors, this update is as follows:
1. Minor optimizations and gameplay fixes
2. iCloud automatic mode changed to manual
3. Added Spanish in DLC
4. Support iOS 13
5. Temporarily replace Russian and Portuguese with English in DLC. We will localize as soon as possible and we are looking for native players who are fluent in English to help us.

If you like our game, please recommend our game to your favourite YouTubers, streamers, and friends around you.
If you have any problems, please do not hesitate to contact us. cs@digipotato.cn

Hi, survivors in Delivery From The Pain, we would like to thank you all for supporting small indie game studio like us, we have provided you a better survival adventure experience with new updates:
1. Minor optimizations and gameplay fixes
2. The "Graphic quality" adjustment in the "Setting" gives you better gaming experience.
3. Support iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max

If you like our game, please recommend our game to your favourite YouTubers, streamers, and friends around you.
If you have any problems, please do not hesitate to contact us. cs@digipotato.cn.

Challenge Mode is available in "Delivery From the Pain", & all players who have purchased this game can get a free update. We listen, We care. People playing our games want the best & we want to make your gaming experience worthwhile. Contact us & we will answer each question as best we might, in shortest time. Who would we be without you? Contact with ideas, information, advice, things good or bad.

What is Challenge Mode? 
1. The core of the gameplay is to live longer in the game as the ultimate goal. The challenge mode uses large map scene, which can be used except for BOSS scenes and other scenes of NPCs.
2. The difficulty of Challenge Mode is divided into Normal & Professional. In Professional difficult, saving file will be deleted when the player failed. The challenge will be restarted. In Normal difficulty, saving file can be saved, & the save rule is the same as the game normal mode rule.
3. The optional characters of Challenge Mode are Freeman Mason, Samantha Aran & Big Brother. The characters retain professional strengths and weaknesses, & players can choose the character to play according to their own preferences.
4. Added Zombie Hoard Rush mode. Start from a shelter, explore around, & collect resources to kill zombies. When Zombie Hoard Rush comes, it will take the shelter as the centre and produce regular zombies to the surrounding scene. At this time, the player will not be able to enter the scene occupied by the zombies. After Zombie Hoard Rush, the survival resources and zombies will be refreshed & regenerated, the difficulty of certain games will be increased. Players are encouraged to explore farther scenes to increase the fun of the game.
5. You can make your own Dog-House & Automobile, no longer limited to the plots and characters. In addition, the fitness system will also be common among the three roles. Unlike DLC, all characters must use traps for hunting & can cook; other manufacturing and learning skills are the same as the main game & DLC.
6. The player will score after death. Each mode retains the record of the longest survival time. According to different days, the gears are pass, good, excellent and distinguished.

Challenge Mode is available in "Delivery From the Pain", & all players who have purchased this game can get a free update. We listen, We care. People playing our games want the best & we want to make your gaming experience worthwhile. Contact us & we will answer each question as best we might, in shortest time. Who would we be without you? Contact with ideas, information, advice, things good or bad.

What is Challenge Mode? 
1. The core of the gameplay is to live longer in the game as the ultimate goal. The challenge mode uses large map scene, which can be used except for BOSS scenes and other scenes of NPCs.
2. The difficulty of Challenge Mode is divided into Normal & Professional. In Professional difficult, saving file will be deleted when the player failed. The challenge will be restarted. In Normal difficulty, saving file can be saved, & the save rule is the same as the game normal mode rule.
3. The optional characters of Challenge Mode are Freeman Mason, Samantha Aran & Big Brother. The characters retain professional strengths and weaknesses, & players can choose the character to play according to their own preferences.
4. Added Zombie Hoard Rush mode. Start from a shelter, explore around, & collect resources to kill zombies. When Zombie Hoard Rush comes, it will take the shelter as the centre and produce regular zombies to the surrounding scene. At this time, the player will not be able to enter the scene occupied by the zombies. After Zombie Hoard Rush, the survival resources and zombies will be refreshed & regenerated, the difficulty of certain games will be increased. Players are encouraged to explore farther scenes to increase the fun of the game.
5. You can make your own Dog-House & Automobile, no longer limited to the plots and characters. In addition, the fitness system will also be common among the three roles. Unlike DLC, all characters must use traps for hunting & can cook; other manufacturing and learning skills are the same as the main game & DLC.
6. The player will score after death. Each mode retains the record of the longest survival time. According to different days, the gears are pass, good, excellent and distinguished.

Hi, we have provided you a better survival adventure experience with new updates:
1. Localization dialogues & scripts updated.
2. Minor optimizations and gameplay fixes.

We appreciate every comment & idea, knowing that our fan-base & following Player community are important & your opinions matter.
If you have any problems, please do not hesitate to contact us. cs@digipotato.cn.
